title: Co-creating Norwegian DigiPer: a digital tool including peer support for managing mental, physical, and social health in serious mental illness

abstract: Background People with serious mental illness (SMI) often encounter physical health issues, a lack of focus on self-management, and persistent symptoms of mental illness. Strategies to empower people with SMI to self-manage their mental, physical …

title: Cross-patient seizure prediction via continuous domain adaptation and similar sample replay
details: Z Zhang, A Liu, Y Gao, R Qian, X Chen - Cognitive Neurodynamics, 2025
abstract: Seizure prediction based on electroencephalogram (EEG) for people with epilepsy, a common brain disorder worldwide, has great potential for life quality improvement. To alleviate the high degree of heterogeneity among patients, several works have …
